forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock strikes just past ten in Downtown San Francisco, the horizon stretches out in a soft embrace of clarity. Mostly sunny skies crown the day, inviting you to revel in the gentle charm of a city draped in golden hues. A brisk west-southwest breeze dances through the streets, suggesting a playful energy; this is the kind of day that makes even the most mundane moments feel alive. The temperature meanders around sixty degrees, a tender reminder to layer thoughtfully—perhaps a light jacket or sweater as a companion for those stretches of shade that can nip at your skin.

Tonight, as the day gives way to the cool embrace of evening, the clouds will flirt ever so lightly with the stars, whispering promises of a low around fifty-three. While the wind may persist, bringing with it a crispness typical of coastal evenings, it leaves behind a trail of delightful refreshment, perfect for unwinding in a quaint cafe or strolling along the waterfront. Consider inviting a good book and a warm drink to accompany you, where the soft murmur of conversation and the distant sounds of the bay create an atmosphere both calming and inspiring, encouraging reflection and gentle smiles in the fading light.
